Welcome to the listening test

This listening assessment is comprised of 2 parts:

  • Test 1: Sound quality
  • Test 2: Interference

The order in which you take each test is set by the experimenter. Each test will take between 30 and 50 minutes.

In both cases you will listen to 8 samples of a vocal recording that has been extracted from a song. Your task is to rate each sample according to one of the two perceptual attributes. This task is then repeated for a number of songs. Both experiments involve an initial training stage which will:

  • Allow you to familiarise yourself with the perceptual attribute we are interested in.
  • Give you an opportunity to gain some intuition for the main interface.

Please let the experimenter know if you have any questions or wish to take a break at any point!

Start your assigned experiment by clicking on the button

Sound quality Interference
